programme.title: California's progressive social legislation
programme.short_synopsis: Homogenisation of US life and why California leads in creating new social legislation.
programme.medium_synopsis: The homogenisation of US life and media, California's lead in social legislation and two new Californian propositions on English for immigrants and labour union spending.
